summary: The mastermind behind a ubiquitous spy operation learns of a dangerous romance between a Russian lady in his employ and a dashing agent from the government's secret service.
cast: Rudolf Klein-Rogge|Gerda Maurus|Lien Deyers|Louis Ralph|Craighall Sherry|Willy Fritsch|Paul Hörbiger|Hertha von Walther|Lupu Pick|Fritz Rasp|Grete Berger|Julius Falkenstein|Heinrich Gotho|Gustl Gstettenbaur|Georg John|Theodor Loos|Klaus Pohl|Paul Rehkopf|Rosa Valetti|Hermann Vallentin|Hans Heinrich von Twardowski
title: Los espías
